colorScale.legendDescription: Does the law mandate equal remuneration for females and males for work of equal value?

title: Law mandates equal pay for work of equal value for women and men
subtitle: “Remuneration” refers to the basic wage or salary and any additional fees or profits. "Work of equal value” refers not only to the same or similar jobs but also to different jobs of the same value.
sourceDesc: World Bank, Gender Statistics (based on multiple sources)
